Lyric:
[00:00.900]I do my makeup in somebody else's car
[00:08.020]We order different drinks at the same bars
[00:14.900]I know about what you did and I wanna scream the truth
[00:22.860]She thinks you love the beach, you're such a damn liar
[00:29.940]Those great whites, they have big teeth
[00:34.080]Hope they bite you
[00:35.380]Thought you said that you would always be in love
[00:38.270]But you're not in love no more
[00:41.560]Did it frighten you
[00:42.880]How we kissed when we danced on the light up floor?
[00:45.750]On the light up floor
[00:48.960]But I hear sounds in my mind
[00:56.550]Brand new sounds in my mind
[01:02.130]But honey I'll be seein' you 'ever I go
[01:09.390]But honey I'll be seein' you down every road
[01:14.590]I'm waiting for it, that green light, I want it
[01:17.040]'Cause honey I'll come get my things, but I can't let go
[01:22.060]I'm waiting for it, that green light, I want it
[01:24.380]Oh, I wish I could get my things and just let go
[01:29.490]I'm waiting for it, that green light, I want it
[01:33.120]Sometimes I wake up in a different bedroom
[01:41.040]I whisper things, the city sings 'em back to you
[01:48.010]All those rumors, they have big teeth
[01:52.200]Hope they bite you
[01:53.570]Thought you said that you would always be in love
[01:56.470]But you're not in love no more
[01:59.610]Did it frighten you

[02:03.840]On the light up floor
[02:07.160]But I hear sounds in my mind
[02:14.730]Brand new sounds in my mind
[02:20.520]But honey I'll be seein' you 'ever I go
[02:27.570]But honey I'll be seein' you down every road
[02:32.800]I'm waiting for it, that green light, I want it
[02:35.180]'Cause honey I'll come get my things, but I can't let go
[02:40.200]I'm waiting for it, that green light, I want it
[02:42.550]Oh, honey I'll come get my things, but I can't let go
[02:47.590]I'm waiting for it, that green light, I want it
[02:50.000]Yes, honey I'll come get my things, but I can't let go
